content: --अंतः {1} an occasion, incident, event; अनेनारण्यकवृत्तांतेन पर्याकुलाः स्मः <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 66</ls>, <ls>U. 2. 17.</ls> {2} news, tidings, intelligence; को नु खलु वृत्तांतः <ls>V. 4</ls>; <ls>R. 14. 87.</ls> {3} account, history, tale, narrative, story. {4} a subject, topic. {5} a kind, sort. {6} mode, manner. {7} state, condition. {8} the whole, totality. {9} rest, leisure. {10} retirement, solitude {11} property, nature.
